channel.title: Whoops
channel.description: hey guys, I know this is in the wrong section and I'm sorry but I am in desperate need of help, I'v searched everywhere and can't find help! Okay so I have a web host and I want a free forum that can use the host that I already have (I need it to use the host I already have for voting). But that also gives me quite a bit of things I can do/change on the forums, I have myBB currently but it doesn't do all the things I need. So can anyone help? And again, I'm sorry for putting this in the wrong section.

item.title: Whoops
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Able to add new pages, custom theme creater, & able to run a webclient with an HTML, every other site I’v had wont let me run webclient with HTML I have to use a site that I really hate it I can’t ever edit my server cus the site laggs so much. You can still play but I just can’t edit the client ever.

Read full topic
